mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_appro_modify_log (USER_ID,OLD_CONTENT, NEW_CONTENT, TYPE, ADDTIME, STAFF_ID, ADD_IP, ADD_MAC, REMARK,isPassed,PLATFORM) VALUES (#{userId},#{oldContent},#{newContent},#{type},#{addtime},#{staffId},#{addIp},#{addMac},#{remark},#{isPassed},#{platform})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
